item.title: Help please with ownergear command
item.dc:creator: @theham22 theham22
item.description:
@theham22 wrote:

[quote=“go armand, post:3, topic:409181”]place this command under the ‘owner’ section in your commands file.
also, make sure that your player rights are >= 3.

idk if you have to, but once you’ve edited that. close your source if you’re running it.
save your commands file
compile the source.
and run the source again.

if this still doesnt work. then i have no freaking clue

forgots to mention, if you attempt to change your player rights. make sure your account is logged out before editing the file.
once you’ve changed rights to 3. then save and log in.[/quote]

thanks if i could rep+ i would this helped:D I had it in the wrong section

Read full topic

item.title: Help please with ownergear command
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

place this command under the ‘owner’ section in your commands file.
also, make sure that your player rights are >= 3.

idk if you have to, but once you’ve edited that. close your source if you’re running it.
save your commands file
compile the source.
and run the source again.

if this still doesnt work. then i have no freaking clue

forgots to mention, if you attempt to change your player rights. make sure your account is logged out before editing the file.
once you’ve changed rights to 3. then save and log in.

Read full topic

if (playerCommand.equals("ownergear") && (c.playerRights = 3)) {
			c.sendMessage("Thanks for being a teriffic owner, here is your OwnerGear.");
			c.getItems().addItem(13531, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2417, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(10370, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(10372, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(10374, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(10444, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(10450, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(10456, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(10474, 1);

item.title: Help please with ownergear command
item.dc:creator: @theham22 theham22
item.description:
@theham22 wrote:

hey can someone please help me with ::ownergear command i’ve got this so far:

if (playerCommand.equals(“ownergear”) && (c.playerRights >= 3)) {
c.sendMessage(“Thanks for being a teriffic owner, here is your OwnerGear.”);
c.getItems().addItem(13531, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(2417, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(10370, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(10372, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(10374, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(10444, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(10450, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(10456, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(10474, 1);

	}

why won’t this work? please answer asap thanks
